channel.title: My runescape story :)
channel.description:
I register on runescape ( 2004 ) I played i was lvl 3 I Trained till i was lvl 4 I Trained till i was lvl 5 I Trained till i was lvl 6 I Trained till i was lvl 7 I Trained till i was lvl 8 I Trained till i was lvl 9 I Trained till i was lvl 10 .... I Trained till i was lvl 32 I Trained till i was lvl 33
Well i was bored i had all quest done so i made my self member
I Trained till i was lvl 34 I Trained till i was lvl 35 I Trained till i was lvl 36 ... I Trained till i was lvl 56 I Trained till i was lvl 57
I got banned for 3 weeks cuz i flamed at a mod -.-
I Trained till i was lvl 58 I Trained till i was lvl 59 I Trained till i was lvl 60
Member days went off .. didnt play for 1.2months i played again made myself member
And again
I Trained till i was lvl 61 I Trained till i was lvl 62 I Trained till i was lvl 63 I Trained till i was lvl 64 .... I Trained till i was lvl 70 Well a friend gave me 10 mil i was verry happy So i trained more
I Trained till i was lvl 71 I Trained till i was lvl 72 I Trained till i was lvl 73 Got hacked .. i was verry angry so i wanted to stop Stoped like 2 days :P
I Trained till i was lvl 74 I Trained till i was lvl 75 ....
I Trained till i was lvl 80
I meeted a jagex mod who proberly wanted to make me moderator ..
I Trained till i was lvl 81 I Trained till i was lvl 82 I Trained till i was lvl 83 I Trained till i was lvl 84
Had a message from that Jagex Mod That it didnt go on for moderator cuz a other jagex member didnt want me as a Moderator ..
I Trained till i was lvl 85 I Trained till i was lvl 86 - Founded 39mil on ground a lvl 121 died :P :-X I Trained till i was lvl 87
I saw a guy lvl 3 whit Wearing full dragon :O How its possible you think ? Well his stats where just 1.. So i sayd to a friend of me ( MOD ) that there is someone using proberly A bot so my friend ( MOD ) Informated a jagex mod .. Well we waited there .. And floop! 6 jagex mod around him ! :P They said all on the same time :P Banning time :P FLOOP He was banned ... Well that whas funny to see :P Well thats the story for now :)
~Svenimen S

item.description:
@ryan123 wrote:

thats halarious?..i found a glitch i was a lvl 3 wearing full dragon…but i never got banned…and now im lvl 99…lol?..but if ur lvl 3 wearing dragon it doesnt give u bonuses…sucks dont it?..lol

item.title: My runescape story :)
item.dc:creator: @svenimen_s Melissa T
item.description:
@svenimen_s wrote:

I register on runescape ( 2004 )
I played i was lvl 3
I Trained till i was lvl 4
I Trained till i was lvl 5
I Trained till i was lvl 6
I Trained till i was lvl 7
I Trained till i was lvl 8
I Trained till i was lvl 9
I Trained till i was lvl 10
…
I Trained till i was lvl 32
I Trained till i was lvl 33

Well i was bored i had all quest done so i made my self member

I Trained till i was lvl 34
I Trained till i was lvl 35
I Trained till i was lvl 36
…
I Trained till i was lvl 56
I Trained till i was lvl 57

I got banned for 3 weeks cuz i flamed at a mod -.-

I Trained till i was lvl 58
I Trained till i was lvl 59
I Trained till i was lvl 60

Member days went off … didnt play for 1.2months
i played again made myself member

And again

I Trained till i was lvl 61
I Trained till i was lvl 62
I Trained till i was lvl 63
I Trained till i was lvl 64
…
I Trained till i was lvl 70
Well a friend gave me 10 mil i was verry happy
So i trained more

I Trained till i was lvl 71
I Trained till i was lvl 72
I Trained till i was lvl 73
Got hacked …
i was verry angry so i wanted to stop
Stoped like 2 days

I Trained till i was lvl 74
I Trained till i was lvl 75
…

I Trained till i was lvl 80

I meeted a jagex mod who proberly wanted to make me moderator …

I Trained till i was lvl 81
I Trained till i was lvl 82
I Trained till i was lvl 83
I Trained till i was lvl 84

Had a message from that Jagex Mod That it didnt go on for moderator cuz a other jagex member didnt want me as a Moderator …

I Trained till i was lvl 85
I Trained till i was lvl 86

  • Founded 39mil on ground a lvl 121 died :-X
    I Trained till i was lvl 87

I saw a guy lvl 3 whit Wearing full dragon How its possible you think ? Well his stats where just 1…
So i sayd to a friend of me ( MOD ) that there is someone using proberly A bot so my friend ( MOD ) Informated a jagex mod …
Well we waited there …
And floop! 6 jagex mod around him !
They said all on the same time Banning time
FLOOP He was banned …
Well that whas funny to see
Well thats the story for now

~Svenimen S
